title: Manabiya Sannin Kichisa
sinopse:
Perky Yaoya is a first year student at Koushinmaru High School and a new member of the school newspaper staff. In order to become a full member of the staff she must uncover the identities of the Sannin Kichisa, a mysterious trio of masked avengers haunting the school!

(Source: Ochibichan)
